com.jalios.jcms.rest.resources

Class WhoAmIResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • com.jalios.jcms.rest.JcmsRestResource
        • com.jalios.jcms.rest.DataRestResource
          • com.jalios.jcms.rest.resources.WhoAmIResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MashupConstants, RestConstants

    public class WhoAmIResource
extends DataRestResource
    Open API resource providing informations about current logged member. Useful when authentication is not explictely performed by Open API client but provided through any SSO.
